name: Catchbot tournament
description:
= Catchbot tournament = Welcome to the tournament ! Don’t be caught within 10 seconds 3 times in a row or it’s GAME OVER

Disclaimer : there is a build error that mess with the physic of our game… all is way more slow than on test within unity… we’re investigating…

  • V1.2 : some lil' physic bugs were still remaining...
  • V1.1 : Fixing the weird physic behavior, have fun :D
The rules : You have to avoid being catch by you opponent. However, he WILL catch eventually ! So try to delay this inevitable faith ! 1/ First you’ll face you opponent with nothing but your bare drone.

Your skills :

  • Move your drone with WASD (or ZQSD if you’re European ;p )
  • Use your DASH ability (Left Shift Key) to try some dodge (with a short cooldown)
  • You can use your EMP bomb (Spacebar) to repel the opponent (with a long cooldown)
2/ After he caught you (and he will) you’ll enter build mode.

3/ In build mode you’ll be able to add some obstacles and traps to help you not being caught.

4/ repeat ! But beware ! If you are caught within 10 seconds 3 times in a row it’s GAME OVER !!
